catalog
CREATE TABLE `simple_school` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `parentid` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `text` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `createdate` datetime NOT NULL, `description` varchar(256) default NULL, `oorder` bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

simple_dialog
CREATE TABLE `simple_dialog` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `sentId` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `toId` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `createdate` datetime NOT NULL, `lastdate` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

simple_dialog_item
CREATE TABLE `simple_dialog_item` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `dialogId` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `sentdate` datetime NOT NULL, `content` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

it_counter
CREATE TABLE `it_counter` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `counter` bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
